Package com.googlecode.transmuter.converter

Defines converters and converter-related classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Binding Represents an immutable invokable object, made binding a method to an object (which may be null if the method is static).
Converter A binding which has a converter type, and so can safely be used by a transmuter.
ConverterType Represents a converter's "type": the input type (called fromType) paired with its output type (called toType).
Converts.EagerProvider Scans a given object for all public methods marked with the Converts annotation, binding them with the given object and making iterators available as per Iterable protocol.
Converts.LazyProvider Scans a given object for all public methods marked with the Converts annotation, binding them with the given object and making iterators available as per Iterable protocol.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Converts Intended to mark a method as a prospective converter method.
 

Package com.googlecode.transmuter.converter Description

Defines converters and converter-related classes.
